assignedto_id.description: The ID of the user the entire test plan is assigned to

blocked_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan marked as blocked

completed_on.description: The date/time when the test plan was closed (as UNIX timestamp)

created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the test plan

created_on.description: The date/time when the test plan was created (as UNIX timestamp)

custom_status1_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan with the respective custom status

custom_status2_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan with the respective custom status

custom_status3_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan with the respective custom status

custom_status4_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan with the respective custom status

custom_status5_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan with the respective custom status

custom_status6_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan with the respective custom status

custom_status7_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan with the respective custom status

description.description: The description of the test plan

entries.description: An array of 'entries', i.e. group of test runs

failed_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan marked as failed

id.description: The unique ID of the test plan

is_completed.description: True if the test plan was closed and false otherwise

milestone_id.description: The ID of the milestone this test plan belongs to

name.description: The name of the test plan

passed_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan marked as passed

project_id.description: The ID of the project this test plan belongs to

retest_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan marked as retest

untested_count.description: The amount of tests in the test plan marked as untested

url.description: The address/URL of the test plan in the user interface
